title: TopoMath
description: Designed and implemented a web app for my calculus professor to help students visualize and connect calculus to the real world. It renders procedural terrain based on a math expression.

title: Discorb
description: Reimplemented a clone of Discord.com in React. All graphics, animations, and responsiveness included.

title: TexToIL
description: Implemented a compiler for TeX math expressions. It generates an intermediate language that allows expressions to be manipulated in a variety of ways (without reparsing the string).
